name: little chimera
description:
You're an ungainly, floppy caterpillar thing with one goal: get as high as you can. Eat other critters to get more wings (up to 6), and flap those wings like no tomorrow. The higher the altitude, the harder it is to gain height, but the local critters will have stronger wings, too.

(We regrettably had no time to add a ceiling or a real end state, but if you see the goat you can count yourself a winner.)

Art: Greg Puzniak & Ben Thomas - gregpuzniak.wordpress.com @benthomasaurus

Code: Josh Mohan & David Rusak - @joshuamohan @breakfeast

Audio: Ryan Roth - @dualryan
